channel.title: cute casual on courtside nyc
channel.description: Recent content in cute casual on courtside nyc

item.title: tatiana by kwame onwuachi
item.description: thoughts walk into lincoln center, it’s on the right menu highlights everything we ate was insanely good my two favorites were the egusi dumplings & the short rib pastrami suya

item.title: figure eight
item.description: menu highlights long beans sun chokes corn jalepe√±o bolobao

item.title: jolene
item.description: thoughts truly some of the kindest staff

item.title: gallow green
item.description: thoughts restaurant on the roof of the mccitrick hotel, where they do sleep no more(a live reenactment of shakespeare’s macbeth) very interesting vibe, staff are sometimes also actors in the show, quirky vibes summer only, no outdoor heaters so if it’s cold dress warm

item.title: laser wolf
item.description: thoughts bar seating is first come first serve and they have a lot of seats menu highlights i’m hesitant to put anything here because everything was a hit. there were no misses, so you can’t go wrong. tuna shishlik

item.title: l'antica pizzeria da michele
item.description: menu highlights arancini

item.title: hudson clearwater
item.description: thoughts private dining room downstairs, great for birthday dinner

item.title: au cheval
item.description: thoughts brought my dad here when i couldn’t do another steakhouse. he loved it. basement bar menu highlights the burger, duh

item.title: dame
item.description: thoughts top contender for best meal of 2023 menu highlights everything is good, can’t miss the fish n chips though such a good wine list

item.title: silver apricot
item.description: menu highlights scallion puffs

item.title: rosella
item.description: thoughts tough reservation, but saw several people walk in right when it opened, so great for walk-in early dinner menu highlights dragonfly house salad we also got something with apples that was insance, but i think that dish might be seasonal

item.title: emmett's on grove
item.description: thoughts super thin crust pizza is delicious and 6 “slices” feels like 1 normal slice of pizza, so your group can order multiple pizzas and not live in fear of leftovers or over-ordering i saw two birthday dinners during my 2 hour dining experience and they bring out sparklers! they have a couple big tables, but the best is the giant circular booth in the back left corner. you can fit 10 friends and get to talk to everyone! menu highlights key lime pie was so good it brought tears to my eyes.

item.title: left bank
item.description: thoughts easy last minute brunch won’t knock your socks off

item.title: nonna dora's
item.description: thoughts in a city with an italian restaurant on every block, this place soars above the average food was amazing and the staff were so so kind! menu highlights meatballs they have a negroni menu

item.title: bobo
item.description: thoughts bar downstairs also cute for drinks or a date

item.title: malaparte
item.description: menu highlights tiramisu excellent

item.title: mino brasserie
item.description: thoughts came here with a party of 8 menu highlights steak sandwich

item.title: shukette
item.description: thoughts one of my all time favorite restaurants in new york. menu highlights get all the breads and dips

item.title: sidney's five
item.description: thoughts just good vibes all around. menu highlights corn dogs lol

item.title: 12 chairs cafe
item.description: thoughts the tables are extremely tight. you will be on top of each other, but vibes couldn’t be fresher. it’s always packed. brunch is lit - especially if the sun is out, the hoes will be hoeing and the brunch will be brunching. menu highlights low-key the schnitzel slaps arayes

item.title: frenchette
item.description: thoughts they have cozy booths that are great for a party of 4-6 menu highlights sourghdough pancake (only served for brunch on saturdays & sundays)

item.title: st. tropez
item.description: west village location soho location thoughts came here for birthday dinner waiter so so fun & brought us shots (didn’t know what a gin gimlet was though so maybe stick to wine)

item.title: chama mama
item.description: menu highlights try the georgian wine! mushrooms sleeper hit

item.title: freeman's
item.description: thoughts they have not one but two different back rooms to host your birthday brunch parents love this place rustic, farm house, ski lodge chic menu highlights spinach artichoke dip

item.title: nat's on bank
item.description: thoughts rip nat’s on bleecker

item.title: lola taverna
item.description: thoughts sit curbside with a glass of wine and people watch for hours food is mid, but the vibes are summer

item.title: llama san
item.description: thoughts japanese + peruvian

item.title: dante
item.description: thoughts best cocktail bar in new york. menu highlights martini negroni

item.title: fiaschetteria pistoia
item.description: thoughts wine changes all the time, they bring your choices out in a carrier, very fun post dinner espresso hits

item.title: cafe cluny
item.description: thoughts odds of d list celebrity sighting are high. bring your friend who’s cosplaying as an influencer while you enjoy a delicious burger. two birds one stone. menu highlights fries are excellent.

item.title: rosemarys
item.description: west village location east village location midtown location thoughts nothing special, but v reliable menu highlights restuarant week deal is always good

item.title: bea
item.description: thoughts very close to broadway if you’re trying to catch a show menu highlights good cocktails

item.title: flex mussels
item.description: menu highlights classic white wine thai

item.title: emmy squared
item.description: menu highlights this is a pizza place, but the burger is phenomenal. it’s a double stacked smash patty served on a pretzel bun with waffle fries. i’m drooling.

item.title: aria
item.description: thoughts sit at the bar
